name: MOSQUITOS (itch)
description:
WELCOME TO MOSQUITOS:

This is a small project a wanted to do to try the Unreal Engine. It has no music because I wanted to do every asset myself and I can't do music :D

Enjoy!

Controls:

WASD  - Move
Mouse - Look/Aim
Left Mouse Click - Shoot
F - Place turrets
Escape / Q - Pause
